describe: Belize is a small Central American nation known for its rich biodiversity and distinct cultural heritage. It boasts a Caribbean coastline, lush jungles, and ancient Mayan ruins.

cities.name: 🏝 Belize City
cities.geographical_location: Located on the eastern coast of Belize, facing the Caribbean Sea.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with a wet and dry season, experiencing high humidity and temperatures averaging 75-85°F (24-29°C).
cities.famous_cuisine: Rice and beans, stew chicken, and fry jacks.

cities.name: 🏝 San Pedro
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the southern part of Ambergris Caye, off the northeastern coast of Belize.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with warm temperatures year-round, averaging 80-90°F (27-32°C).
cities.famous_cuisine: Seafood ceviche, conch fritters, and lobster dishes.

cities.name: 🌳 Belmopan
cities.geographical_location: Located near the center of Belize, in the Cayo District.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with a distinct wet and dry season, temperatures ranging from 70-90°F (21-32°C).
